system.description: You have achieved complete mastery of melta weapons, able to focus their superheated beams with deadly precision to penetrate even the most heavily armoured targets.
system.benefit: Whenever this character makes a ranged attack with a melta weapon, they increase its Penetration by +2 per Two Degrees of Success scored beyond the first. This Bonus is applied after the benefit of the Melta Quality is applied.

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced Penetration
specialAbilities.description: When attacking with a melta weapon, gain +2 Penetration for every 2 Degrees of Success beyond the first. Applied after Melta Quality.
